sentences.cn: 一家新开的大型购物中心

sentences.en: He escorted Tessio out of the kitchen and onto the mall.
sentences.cn: 说罢,陪着忒希奥走进厨房,跨上了林荫道.

sentences.en: I want all the land around the mall bought , the houses bought.
sentences.cn: 我要把林荫道附近的土地统统买下来.

sentences.en: If you see something you like at the mall, walk away.
sentences.cn: 如果在商城里看见某件你喜欢的东西，（别买）走开。

sentences.en: In the winter I head for the mall.
sentences.cn: 在冬日里,我前往这个购物商场。

sentences.en: Is there a telephone in the mall?
sentences.cn: 购物商场里有电话机 吗 ?

sentences.en: Is this the bus that goes by the mall?
sentences.cn: 这班公共汽车经过商业街 吗 ?

sentences.en: Kay walked to where her car was parked near the gates of the mall.
sentences.cn: 恺向大门附近停着的汽车走去.

sentences.en: Let’s meet at the mall and go see a movie.
sentences.cn: 我们在购物中心碰头，然后去看电影吧。

sentences.en: Michael wondered how long Sonny could stay cooped up in the safe territory of the mall.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔感到怀疑的是桑儿在林荫道这个安全地带究竟还能窝藏多久.

sentences.en: My friend was hungry, so we drove to a shopping mall to get some food.
sentences.cn: 我的朋友饿了，于是我们开车去一家购物中心吃饭。

sentences.en: Once the compulsive spender stops at the mall, she will be unable to control her spending.
sentences.cn: 患强迫性购物症的人一旦来到购物中心，就无法控制自己的开支。

sentences.en: The crowds thronged into the mall.
The limousine moved off through the gates of the mall.
sentences.cn: 轿车开动了,出了林荫道的大门.

sentences.en: There are 40 shops, cafes and restaurants in a covered mall.
sentences.cn: 这家室内购物中心里有40家商店、咖啡馆和饭店。

sentences.en: There is a large mall on the street.
sentences.cn: 在这条街上有一家大商场.

sentences.en: They reached the grassy mall which fronted on the State Building.
sentences.cn: 他们来到了州议会大厦前面的那片林荫草地.

sentences.en: Thus, teenagers become mall rats, hanging out but rarely shopping in those megamalls.
sentences.cn: 于是，十几岁的孩子们没事就去逛大商场，在里面到处溜达却很少购物。

words.tran_cn: 购物商场；[建]林荫路；铁圈球场

phrases.tran_cn: 逛商厦迷；爱逛商店的年轻人

trans.tran_cn: 购物中心，林荫路，铁圈球场
trans.tran_en: a large area where there are a lot of shops, usually a covered area where cars are not allowed
